name: Corruption / / Takeover
description:
This level was made for DIG 2783 Fundamentals of Game Art by Maxwell Bustamante.

In Corruption / / Takeover you play a security bot - SECUR-bot - that is tasked with destroy a dangerous experiment that broke out of containment. This flower corrupts everything it touches, and is expanding rapidly. You must stop the corruption before it takes over!

CONTROLS:
WASD - Move
LMB - Shoot (Hold LMB to build shot strength)
ESC - Quit Game (Hold down for a second)

Music Credits:
Win, Lose, and Gameplay - Original music by Savfk (www.youtube.com/savfkmusic  www.facebook.com/savfkmusic)
Main Menu Music - CO.AG Music https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcavSftXHgxLBWwLDm_bNvA
